about_the_game: After the initial creation of the corner, additional crew members [Yan Siqi] will be obtained; the Dragon Boat Festival event ship [Dragon Boat for Combat], the Christmas event ship [Christmas Ship], the Spring Festival event ships [Tiger Tiger Shengfeng], [Treading Waves Kyushu]. Not only can it reduce the time to accumulate resources in the initial stage, but also a new exclusive ship for festival events in the future (excluding the existing historical ships in the game) will be given away for free. (All archives of crew and ships can be used in common)
detailed_description: After the initial creation of the corner, additional crew members [Yan Siqi] will be obtained; the Dragon Boat Festival event ship [Dragon Boat for Combat], the Christmas event ship [Christmas Ship], the Spring Festival event ships [Tiger Tiger Shengfeng], [Treading Waves Kyushu]. Not only can it reduce the time to accumulate resources in the initial stage, but also a new exclusive ship for festival events in the future (excluding the existing historical ships in the game) will be given away for free. (All archives of crew and ships can be used in common)
name: The Age of Navigation-Commemorative Edition

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 梦回大航海-纪念版 - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy The Age of Navigation-Commemorative Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: It is a single-player simulation game based on navigation. Players need to earn money by investing and trading in various ports, and interact with local forces to develop their own ports.
